name: lowcoder
description: A Visual App builder with 120+ built-in components. Create software applications (internal and customer-facing!) and Meeting/Collaboration tools for your Company and your Customers with minimal coding experience.

LOWCODER_DB_ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD.description: The encryption password used to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (eg abcd).

LOWCODER_DB_ENCRYPTION_SALT.description: The encryption salt used to encrypt all sensitive credentials in the database. You can use any random string (eg abcd).

LOWCODER_CORS_DOMAINS.description: The domains supported for CORS requests. All domains are allowed by default. If there are multiple domains, please separate them with commas.

LOWCODER_API_RATE_LIMIT.description: Number of max Request per Second

LOWCODER_API_SERVICE_URL.description: Lowcoder API service URL (main backend) - for multi-docker image installations.

LOWCODER_NODE_SERVICE_URL.description: Lowcoder Node Service URL (data execution server) - for multi-docker image installations

LOWCODER_WORKSPACE_MODE.description: SAAS (MULTIWORKSPACE) to activate, SINGLEWORKSPACE (ENTERPRISE) to switch off - Workspaces

LOWCODER_EMAIL_SIGNUP_ENABLED.description: Control if users create their own Workspace automatic when Sign Up

LOWCODER_CREATE_WORKSPACE_ON_SIGNUP.description: IF LOWCODER_WORKSPACE_MODE = SAAS, controls if a own workspace is created for the user after sign up

LOWCODER_MARKETPLACE_PRIVATE_MODE.description: Control if not to show Apps on the local Marketplace to anonymous users

LOWCODER_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: Username of the Super-User of an Lowcoder Installation

LOWCODER_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: Password of the Super-User, if not present or empty, it will be generated

LOWCODER_API_KEY_SECRET.description: String to encrypt/sign API Keys that users may create

LOWCODER_ADMIN_SMTP_HOST.description: SMTP Hostname of your Mail Relay Server

LOWCODER_ADMIN_SMTP_PORT.description: Port number for the SMTP service

LOWCODER_LOST_PASSWORD_EMAIL_SENDER.description: "from" Email address of the password Reset Email Sender

LOWCODER_REDIS_ENABLED.description: If true redis server is started in the single docker image container

LOWCODER_MONGODB_ENABLED.description: If true mongo database is started in the single docker image container

LOWCODER_MONGODB_EXPOSED.description: If true mongo database accept connections from outside the docker in the single docker image container

LOWCODER_API_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: If true lowcoder api-service is started in the container

LOWCODER_NODE_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: If true lowcoder node-service is started in the container

LOWCODER_FRONTEND_ENABLED.description: If true lowcoder web frontend is started in the container

LOWCODER_PUID.description: ID of user running services. It will own all created logs and data.

LOWCODER_PGID.description: ID of group of the user running services.

LOWCODER_PUBLIC_URL.description: The URL of the public User Interface
